predicate.note: Frames file for 'taste' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 30.1, 30.4, 35.3; Framenet entries Perception experience, Appearance, and Perception active.

example.name: nasty trace chains
example.text: ``Parties are rather a state of mind, '' she said, [*-3] pausing only [*-4] to taste [*RNR*-1] and pass judgment on the Georgian shashlik (``a little well done, but very good'').

example.name: beautiful metaphor
example.text: They still buy apples mainly for big, red good looks -- that's why so many taste like woodchucks' punching bags.
